App Name: Junk Smasher

Brief: Enhance your smartphone's performance with Junk Smasher, the all-in-one cleaner and optimization tool designed to keep your device running smoothly. With a suite of powerful tools, this app clears unnecessary files, manages apps, cools down the CPU, and speeds up your phone with a single tap!
